ResourceHeader.ResourceName: The South Pole Search Coil Instrument.
ResourceHeader.Description:
The Search Coil instrument recording geomagnetic micropulsation data at
   frequencies less than about 10 Hz at the South Pole geomagnetic observatory
   at about 90.0 GLat.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark J. Engebretson, Augsburg College (2211 Riverside Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55454-1338, USA) for use of data from the South Pole SearchCoil instrument.
